Text:
For those of you who have never used it before, this is a great little utility.. Definitely worth the small DL and should be part of everyones arsenal of system utilities. Although there are probably other programs out there that do similar things, its nice having a small-sized program like this that allows you to take snapshots of your registry/directories/files/software/drivers/etc all in one click, which can be "compared" to another snapshot (for example, at a later date) to see the differences between the two (such as what changes installing a program made to your registry, etc).. Check it out.

PS. Thx for the upload Anacondaz
